articles.title: Apple Arrives on the Scene With Its AI Debut
articles.content: Our investors' blotter on this episode includes AI, Tesla, Adobe, Trex's CEO, and more.

articles.title: Have Stocks Run too Far, Too Fast? (5 Clues)
articles.content: Stocks have come a long way since bottoming in late 2022. However, data points suggest the bull market still has room to run.

articles.title: S&P 500 Firms Boost Stock Buybacks in Q1: ETF to Tap
articles.content: Stock buybacks are back in vogue this year. Stock buybacks by S&P 500 companies increased 9.9% year over year and 8.1% sequentially in the first quarter of 2024.

articles.title: What Apple Didn't Say
articles.content: We also discuss whether Cracker Barrel can turn things around.

articles.title: Here's What You Need to Know About Tech ETF XLK's Shake-Up
articles.content: Technology Select Sector SPDR Fund (XLK) is poised for a big rebalance this week. This shake-up will increase the exposure to NVIDIA Corp. (NVDA) at the expense of Apple Inc. (AAPL).

articles.title: Nvidia Is Now the World's Most Valuable Company. Is It Time to Sell?
articles.content: History doesn't repeat itself but it rhymes.

articles.title: I Am Loading Up On These 8.5% Yielding REITs
articles.content: High dividend yield typically indicates high risk. But there are exceptions. Check out two 8%+ yielding REITs that I am buying.

articles.title: Zacks Investment Ideas feature highlights: Microsoft, Alphabet, Apple and Morgan Stanley
articles.content: Microsoft, Alphabet, Apple and Morgan Stanley are part of the Zacks Investment Ideas article.

articles.title: Nvidia Just Passed Microsoft to Become the World's Most Valuable Stock. Here's What History Says Happens Next.
articles.content: If you think Nvidia stock has already peaked, then you'll want to look at this.

articles.title: Nvidia Stock Is Up 174% This Year. That's a Big Problem for the Average S&P 500 Stock (and Some Investors).
articles.content: Beating the S&P 500 without exposure to Nvidia has been exceptionally difficult this year.
